accessDenied.contact: Contact {supportEmail} to obtain the necessary access rights.

notFound.title: Oops! It looks like this page doesn't exist
notFound.contact: If you think this is an error, contact

updateSetting.title: Error updating setting
updateSetting.description: Unable to update the display setting. Please try again later.

about.title: About
about.description: EPFL Ticketshop allows the SBB to check the authorizations of EPFL collaborators who need to order travel tickets using EPFL funds.
about.cffUsageTitle: In other words, EPFL Ticketshop allows the SBB to:
about.additionalInfo: EPFL Ticketshop makes it possible to choose the funds on which one is authorized to purchase a train ticket on the SBB platform.
about.cffUsage:
• Validate the authorization to purchase train tickets (Accred right railticket),
  • Retrieve the list of funds and travel requests.

help.title: Help
help.availableHelp: Several help pages are available, starting with KB0012580 (managed by VPT) and the PDF that explains how to link your SwissPass account to your EPFL account.
help.accredRequirement: Make sure you have the Accred « railticket » right on at least one fund. Without this, you will not have access to the system.
help.supportIntro: There are several ways to obtain help, but before opening a support request, make sure you have read KB0012580:
help.helpSwissPass: For questions related to SwissPass issues or the sbb.ch website, contact the SBB hotline;
help.helpSwissPassBuy: For any questions regarding the purchase of train tickets on the SBB Webshop platform
help.helpMobility: https://www.epfl.ch/campus/mobility/fr/mobilite-et-voyages/mobilite-pendulaire/trains/ or mobilite@epfl.ch (opens a ticket with the support group dedicated to Mobility).
help.helpAccredRights: For issues with Accred, access rights, or funds, open a ticket via 1234;
help.helpTicketshopIssues: For issues while using the ticketshop.epfl.ch website (see KB0014657);
help.helpTechnicalContrib: For technical questions or to contribute to the application, visit the GitHub repository and, if necessary, open an issue.

link.title: How to link my SwissPass account with my EPFL account ?

locked.title: My CFF account is locked? What can I do?
locked.description: Your CFF account will be locked after several failed logins. This is not a Tequila/Gaspar problem, no need to change this password. Please contact the Service Desk.

right.title: I am accreditor for unit XYZ but I cannot give the right railticket?
right.description: The right railticket is managed only by people with the respadmin role.

sync.title: Why changes doesn't apply in CFF when I hide / show funds in ticketshop ?
sync.description: Synchronization between ticketshop and CFF might take many hours. After this delay, changes will be affected.

change.title: How to switch from personal account to EPFL account in CFF apps ?
change.description: Identify "factory" icon for business account, and person icon for personal account. In mobile app, it's possible to change during the payment step. Read KB0012580.

tech.title: Technologies used
tech.paragraph: ticketshop.epfl.ch is developed with Next.js, a JavaScript framework based on React.js. Its authentication relies on EntraID. Fund data is retrieved from api.epfl.ch. The application is hosted on Kubernetes (OpenShift) at EPFL.
